intro: Staphylodendrum, commonly known as the starry nightshade, is a genus of flowering plants in the nightshade family, Solanaceae. It is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that often have a star-like appearance, hence its common name. The plants typically have woody stems and are native to regions of South America, particularly Brazil. They are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their vibrant blooms. Staphylodendrum species are also noted for their ability to thrive in a variety of soil types and climates.
